name: Wienieworld
description:
The ultimate wiener dog lovers mobile game app. You can name your wiener dog, design your wiener dog, select the bark. Then you can enter your wiener dog into a race of time to get as many points as possible while avoiding obstacles to gain more time and energy. Also, 5% of app sales proceeds go toward rescue efforts for Dachshunds. Be sure to leave us a review and Like us on Facebook!! Woof Woof.

Instructions to play:

1. To jump swipe up. A small swipe will have a small jump. A bigger swipe will have a higher jump.
2. Avoid obstacles at all times, otherwise you will be losing energy whenever you hit them.
3. Get the jet pack to fly the Wiener around and avoid obstacles for a certain period of time.
4. Get the med pack to bypass obstacles without reducing energy.
5. Jump over all the sinkholes.

To customize your wiener dog, go to the "CUSTOMIZE WEINIE DOG" section. There you can name your dog, change it's color, and change the background music.

Enjoy The Game!!!
